services.description: Providing scholarships, mentorship, and resources to underprivileged students, especially in rural villages, to help them continue their studies and fulfill their dreams.
services.focus: Empowering children with hidden talent to escape poverty and achieve self-reliance.

images.note: Rural school / children image (education & school context).

services.description: Spreading health awareness among villagers through wellness programs, health camps, and lifestyle awareness initiatives. Providing medical support when needed.
services.focus: Building physically and mentally resilient communities for a healthy, peaceful life.

images.note: Doctor checking blood pressure — suitable for community health camp visuals.

services.description: Focused on overall rural development to create self-reliant societies. This includes livelihood programs, infrastructure support, and community empowerment initiatives.
services.focus: Supporting underprivileged people in villages with essential needs.

images.note: Search results page with multiple rural / community images; swap in a specific photo that best matches your project.

services.description: Providing assistance and care for the elderly in rural areas. This includes health check-ups, social inclusion activities, and basic needs support.
services.focus: Ensuring dignity and well-being for vulnerable members of society.

images.note: Portrait of an older person (good for elderly-support communications).
Senior couple on a walk — shows dignity and mobility support.

services.description: Offering food support to those in immediate need. This includes meal distributions, food packages, and emergency food relief efforts.
services.focus: Temporary relief for poor and underprivileged individuals.

images.note: Volunteers packing food — good for event flyers or reports.

outcomes.indicator: Number of scholarships granted and students enrolled/retained in school

outcomes.target: Increase pass rate by 20% for supported students
outcomes.indicator: Change in pass rates and progression to next grade
Number of mentorship sessions held and mentee satisfaction scores

outcomes.target: 12 camps/year (1 per month in rotated villages)
outcomes.indicator: Number of camps and people screened/treated
Attendance records + pre/post awareness survey improvement
Follow-up visit records and treatment completion rates
Number of functioning projects and average household income change

outcomes.target: Improve access to clean water / sanitation for 60% of households in targeted villages
outcomes.indicator: Infrastructure installed and % households with access

outcomes.target: Train 100 village leaders in project management & maintenance
outcomes.indicator: Training attendance and post-training competence assessments
Visit logs, basic health checks, and wellbeing scores

outcomes.metric: Access to basic healthcare and meds
outcomes.target: Ensure 90% of registered elderly have access to essential meds/services
Quarterly community engagement events for the elderly
outcomes.indicator: Event attendance and loneliness/wellbeing survey results

outcomes.target: Respond within 48 hours for urgent requests
outcomes.indicator: Average response time and number of emergency kits deployed

outcomes.target: Reduce households with severe food insecurity by 30% in targeted villages

_notes: Images are Unsplash links (free to use per Unsplash license). Swap photos as needed; for rural development you may want to choose a highly local image to reflect the exact community you serve.
